scenario_text.value:
(It’s obvious how screwy things are between
Shuuji and Lopmon, even from the outside.)
(I wonder if me and Agumon are good?)

Hey Agumon, is there anything I’ve ever said
or asked you to do that you didn’t like?
Hmm? Nope, not a thing.

Seriously? You’re sure you’re not just,
I dunno, putting up with me?
Seriously! I’m not just putting up with you.

Are Shuuji and Lopmon making you worry like
that?

Yeah... Those two made me wonder if I’d done
anything uncool to you, Agumon.
Hey Takuma?

What do you think about us? Me and the other
partners?

(I’m getting flashbacks to the last time
someone asked me the same question.)

(To me, our partners are all friends we can
trust. Still, I feel like I’m being shallow.)

(I think they’re strong and cool, sure.
But is that all that we value them for?)

(All I can say is that Agumon and the others
are strange creatures, but then what?)
(For me, Agumon and the others are...)
Reliable partners.
Strong and cool!
Strange creatures.

You guys are trustworthy partners. That’s
what I think.

Thanks, Takuma. I feel the same way about
you.
Agumon...

Still, you might be the only one who thinks
that way. Who knows about the others...

You guys are strong and cool. Having allies
like you on our side bolsters our spirits.
Ehehe, aww gee whiz!

And hey, it’s not like I only see your
strength! You have tons of other qualities...

That’s just the first thing that came to
mind.

You all seem like strange creatures, I guess.
I’m not sure how else to put it.

Huh! Well I guess I feel the same way about
humans, too.

Sorry, I’m sure there’s a better way to say
it.

Still, if I try to put all of my feelings
into words, that’s all I can manage...
And what’s wrong with that?

The important thing is how you feel,
Takuma.
I’m happy to know your feelings!
I see... What matters is my own feelings.
That, and expressing them to others.

Thank you, Agumon... I think I just learned
something pretty important.
You’re very, very welcome!
You ought to do what you think is best.
